detailsOfAchievement: Our Activities 1.Development of IECs on child marriage and importance of girl child education. 2.Mass awareness on the problem of child marriage by using IECs, Audio/Video medium and TiE tools on child marriage 3.Data base and trend analysis (3 years) of child marriage across various social groups. 4.Formation of village level child protection committee (VLCPC) by involving PRI representatives, SMCs/PTAs, VHSNCs/ Mata Samiti (ICDS) and strengthen them through regualr meetings 5.Improved school enrolment and retention of girl children in the age group of 12-18 years 6.Regular meetings with SMCs, School Teachers and Principles to motivate them for tracking attendance and retention of girls in schools. 7.Maintain childwise record of girls of 6-18 years and track them for retention. 8.Household visits and meeting with parents parents for motivating them for continuation of girls education. 9.Strengthening of existing children group in coverage area through providing them creative spaces - group meetings, games & sports, TiE, group activities, etc 10.Formation of Adolescent girl groups and its strengthening through monthly meeting & orientation - education, health and hygiene, demerits of early marriage, life skills and career paths, etc. 11.Linking of girl child with Scholarship for SC/Minority children 12.Intervention in child protection cases and issues and also provide safe space for children. 13.Intervention in violence against women cases & issues. Our Achievements 1.We engaged with 9263 children age 0-18 year and also 5072 families. 2. Children group formation 25 and adolescent group formation 19. 3. formation of village wise 19 Jagurk Nagrik Committee . 4. formation of village wise 5 Children Theatre group 5.Knowledge attitude practice on child marriage(KAP study) 6.Develop IECs material on child marriage, Education & Protection-Poster ,pumplates, audio, video. 7.Baal Patrika  Aamli ,Photo story Book on Child Marriage . 8.Intervention on Child Protection cases(73) in a year(2016). 9.Establish computer centre and football for adolescent girls and young women. 10.We organise life skill training program. 11.we organise team capacity workshops child sexual abuse(CSA) , gender & Theatre In Education (TIE), Reproductive health and sexuality , legal workshops, 12. VLCPC formation in 14 Gram Panchayat Kakadi and Panchayat samiti. 13. We organise Child marriage champion for 5 days in every year also children festival and exposure. 14.Enrolled 13 girls in KGBVS.

detailsOfAchievement: SERVICES: Narayan Sewa Sansthan (Trust) rendering services in the field of treatment and rehabilitation of polio affected persons of the society at large, without any discrimination on the ground of religion, region, caste, sex etc.The organization has also engaged itself in different educational, social and medical services for the poor as well as the needy, especially from the tribal belt. It is maintaining an orphan children hostel and a residential school for the blind, deaf-dumb and mentally retarded children. In order to make them self dependant Sansthan is providing training of sewing, carpentry, bamboo work etc. and also has vocational training centers providing courses on computer servicing, T.V. / V.C.R. repairing etc.The Sansthan has frequently been organizing service camps to distribute food grains, medicines and basic utility items to poor tribals, pulse polio drive, environmental awareness camps, distribution of aids & appliance as calipers, crutches, tricycle & wheelchair free of cost etc. Besides these it also arranges Parichay Sammelan (Introduction Ceremony) for the disabled boys and girls and organizezs a ceremony to get them married. AWARDS: 1) Padamshri Award to Shri kailash Chandra Agrawal from her excellency President of India Smt. Pratibha Devi Singh Patil for his excellent social services. 2) National Awrad to Shri Kailash Chandra Agrwal by Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam then the President of India. 3) Godfrey Philips Bravery Award from Shri Bhairon Singh Shekhawat then the Vice President of India. 4) Rashtriya Ratan Award. 5) National Awrd By Smt. Menaka Gandhi to Sansthan for being the best recognition for its outstanding performance in the field of welfare of disable persons. 6) Gem of India Award for outstanding Social Services. 7) Rajiv Gandhi Shiromani Award. 8) State level Award for best Social worker. 9) State level best institute award along with cash award of Rs. Fifty thousand from governer of rajasthan. 10) Pride of India award for excellent work of welfare.
